name: COVIDNATOR
description:
Update 4/5/2020:  Added some UI elements for round won, game over.  Particle effects for cells hit.  Other minor tweaks.

A twin-stick shooter game I thought would make a good teaching tool for my step daughter to show her, in a very basic way, how fast an infection can spread.

I started on this around 11am this morning (4/4/2020) and this is where I'm at as of 6:15pm (4/4/2020).

As you clear infected cells, the next round has a higher percentage of starting cells infected as well as the overall speed the cells moves at increases slightly. 

Made with UE4, mostly my own art with a few things grabbed from royalty free sources online (image of the COVID-19 virus, the caduceus) and my trusty Korg DS-8 for sounds.
